title: Client keeps Crashing
body: My client keeps bugsplatting whenever I try to load into a game. It says it's detected problems with my installation and tries to repair it. It repairs then goes right back to bugsplat. This goes on an endless cycle and I've uninstalled and re-installed the client yet it keeps doing this. I've been placed in low priority queue due to this and I think it's ridiculous.{{sticker:sg-shisa}}

replies.body: Let's end this cycle and put out the fire!  Bugsplats usually occur from bad game files, drivers, or even hardware.  Something seems to be failing to render your game, though it sucks a repair didn't help in this case or reinstall.  Try the additional steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to help rule out more possibilities and fix this up.  Test it in a custom game though to prevent penalties!
